title: French-Canadian mother finds a weird solution to save Ellen Degeneres and Portia de Rossi marriage

meta_data.keywords: ellen degeneres, thank you ellen, portia, incredible, inspiring, funny
meta_data.description: After reading Ellen's book "Seriously...I'm Kidding", a french-canadian finds a weird (but clever!) way to solve one of Ellen's biggest problem she talks about having with Portia in her book.
